fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: EU and NATO activities related with Aerospace Security and Defence
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ASD (Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe) - EOS (European Organization for Security) - Confindustria
goals__remit: Leonardo is the main Italian industrial group operating globally in the aerospace, defence and security sectors, and is one of the world's leading groups in the fields of helicopters and defence electronics. It is also a European Leader for satellite and space services. Headquartered in Italy, and with a vast industrial base in the UK as well as important production facilities in the rest of Europe and the USA, Leonardo has a workforce more than 45,000.
